title: Induced current - power dissipated pulling rod

content.question: In Scenario <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the speed at which the rod is pulled is increased to <math alttext="2 v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math> and the power dissipated by the resistor is <math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. What is the ratio <math alttext="P sub 2 to P sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
